```{r}
#| include: false
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(janitor)
library(usethis)
library(lterdatasampler)
library(dograt)
```

```{r}

ggplot(data = pie_crab, aes(x = size, y = latitude)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_eighties() +
  labs(caption = "pie crabz")
  
```

```{r}

crab_df <- pie_crab %>%
  group_by(size) %>%
  summarise(size_mean = mean(size, na.rm = TRUE), size_sd = sd(size), count = n())

```
